mapper.sql:
where delete_flag = 0
and handle_name like CONCAT('%', #{obj.baseBean.handleName}, '%')
mapper.select: select count(1) as rowTotal from data_unqualified_config
SELECT FROM data_unqualified_config WHERE delete_flag = 0 AND checked = 1 ORDER BY sorting ASC
